member.name: T:AspectSharp.Lang.Steps.Semantic.SemanticAnalizerBase
member.summary: Summary description for SemanticAnalizerBase. TODO: Rewrite using the DepthFirstVisitor

member.name: T:AspectSharp.Lang.GacHelper
member.summary: Provides a method to find nativeName assembly in the GAC by it's simple name.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.GacHelper.GetNextAssembly(AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyEnum,AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName@)
member.summary: Get the next assembly name in the current enumerator or fail
member.returns: 0 if the enumeration is not at its end

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.GacHelper.CreateAssemblyEnum(AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyEnum@,System.IntPtr,AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName,AspectSharp.Lang.ASM_CACHE_FLAGS,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: To obtain nativeName instance of the CreateAssemblyEnum API, call the CreateAssemblyNameObject API.
member.param: Pointer to a memory location that contains the IAssemblyEnum pointer.
Must be null.
An assembly name that is used to filter the enumeration. Can be null to enumerate all assemblies in the GAC.
Exactly one bit from the ASM_CACHE_FLAGS enumeration.
Must be NULL.

member.name: T:AspectSharp.Lang.ASM_NAME
member.summary: The ASM_NAME enumeration property ID describes the valid names of the name-value pairs in nativeName assembly name. See the .NET Framework SDK for a description of these properties.

member.name: T:AspectSharp.Lang.ASM_CACHE_FLAGS
member.summary: The ASM_CACHE_FLAGS enumeration contains the following values: ASM_CACHE_ZAP - Enumerates the cache of precompiled assemblies by using Ngen.exe. ASM_CACHE_GAC - Enumerates the GAC. ASM_CACHE_DOWNLOAD - Enumerates the assemblies that have been downloaded on-demand or that have been shadow-copied.

member.name: T:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName
member.summary: The IAssemblyName interface represents nativeName assembly name. An assembly name includes a predetermined set of name-value pairs. The assembly name is described in detail in the .NET Framework SDK.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.SetProperty(AspectSharp.Lang.ASM_NAME,System.IntPtr,System.UInt32)
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::SetProperty method adds a name-value pair to the assembly name, or, if a name-value pair with the same name already exists, modifies or deletes the value of a name-value pair.
member.param: The ID that represents the name part of the name-value pair that is to be added or to be modified. Valid property IDs are defined in the ASM_NAME enumeration.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the value of the property.
The length of the pvProperty buffer in bytes. If cbProperty is zero, the name-value pair is removed from the assembly name.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.GetProperty(AspectSharp.Lang.ASM_NAME,System.IntPtr,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::GetProperty method retrieves the value of a name-value pair in the assembly name that specifies the name.
member.param: The ID that represents the name of the name-value pair whose value is to be retrieved. Specified property IDs are defined in the ASM_NAME enumeration.
A pointer to a buffer that is to contain the value of the property.
The length of the pvProperty buffer, in bytes.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.Finalize
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::Finalize method freezes nativeName assembly name. Additional calls to IAssemblyName::SetProperty are unsuccessful after this method has been called.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.GetDisplayName(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.UInt32@,AspectSharp.Lang.ASM_DISPLAY_FLAGS)
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::GetDisplayName method returns a string representation of the assembly name.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that is to contain the display name. The display name is returned in Unicode.
The size of the buffer in characters (on input). The length of the returned display name (on return).

One or more of the bits defined in the ASM_DISPLAY_FLAGS enumeration: *_VERSION - Includes the version number as part of the display name. *_CULTURE - Includes the culture. *_PUBLIC_KEY_TOKEN - Includes the public key token. *_PUBLIC_KEY - Includes the public key. *_CUSTOM - Includes the custom part of the assembly name. *_PROCESSORARCHITECTURE - Includes the processor architecture. *_LANGUAGEID - Includes the language ID.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.GetName(System.UInt32@,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::GetName method returns the name part of the assembly name.
member.param: Size of the pwszName buffer (on input). Length of the name (on return).
Pointer to the buffer that is to contain the name part of the assembly name.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.GetVersion(System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::GetVersion method returns the version part of the assembly name.
member.param: Pointer to a DWORD that contains the upper 32 bits of the version number.
Pointer to a DWORD that contain the lower 32 bits of the version number.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.IsEqual(AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName,AspectSharp.Lang.ASM_CMP_FLAGS)
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::IsEqual method compares the assembly name to another assembly names.
member.param: The assembly name to compare to.
Indicates which part of the assembly name to use in the comparison. Values are one or more of the bits defined in the ASM_CMP_FLAGS enumeration.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName.Clone(AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName@)
member.summary: The IAssemblyName::Clone method creates a copy of nativeName assembly name.

member.name: T:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyEnum
member.summary: The IAssemblyEnum interface enumerates the assemblies in the GAC.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyEnum.GetNextAssembly(System.IntPtr,AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyName@,System.UInt32)
member.summary: The IAssemblyEnum::GetNextAssembly method enumerates the assemblies in the GAC.
member.param: Must be null.
Pointer to a memory location that is to receive the interface pointer to the assembly name of the next assembly that is enumerated.
Must be zero.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyEnum.Reset
member.summary: Undocumented. Best guess: reset the enumeration to the first assembly.

member.name: M:AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyEnum.Clone(AspectSharp.Lang.IAssemblyEnum@)
member.summary: Undocumented. Create a copy of the assembly enum that is independently enumerable.
